squidpony.squidmath

Class MitchellNoise

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidmath.MitchellNoise

  • public class MitchellNoise
extends java.lang.Object
    An arbitrary-dimensional noise generator; it's not suitable for real-time use, but could be very useful when used with unconventional axes, particularly during level generation. It produces smooth, cloudy gradient noise.
    It currently is capable of exceeding its normal -1.0 to 1.0 range, so you may want to wrap its result in NumberTools.sway(double) with a 0.5 offset.
    Created by Tommy Ettinger on 11/6/2019 using code by Donald Mitchell.
